quotes.title: Under the Night
quotes.quote: If the Commonwealth's High Guard had a weakness, it was this: Its officers were too competent, too caring, and too brave.
quotes.name: Yin Man-Wei
quotes.source: The Rise and Fall of the Systems Commonwealth

quotes.title: An Affirming Flame
quotes.quote: Some say the Commonwealth would have fallen even without Nietzschean treachery.  They underestimate both the Commonwealth and the Nietzscheans in a single breath.
quotes.name: Yin Man-Wei
quotes.source: The Rise and Fall of the Systems Commonwealth
